Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
Welcome to the OpenCms getting started guide. On this page you will learn how to:

  • Install OpenCms
  • Try the basic content management features of OpenCms

You can install OpenCms along with the OpenCms Mercury demo. Mercury is the standard template of OpenCmsâ€”a feature-rich, modular template and the Mercury demo presents what is possible with OpenCms.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Try OpenCms! We show how to download and install OpenCms.
